name: War Heroes
blurb: A World War 2 themed squad management game.  Hire, train, and equip your soldiers, then send them out to war!

rewards.reward: SUPPORTER - My gratitude and an e-mail thanking you for noticing and believing in this project.  At this point, it's not the money, but the faith. :)
PRIVATE - Get a copy of the game when it's finished, and rest easy knowing that you've helped another indie game to completion!
PRIVATE FIRST CLASS - All previous rewards, along with special thanks in the credits.  Now we're getting somewhere!

SPECIALIST - You'll get a copy of the game, thanks in the credits, and a mini-soundtrack of the game's original compositions.  In addition, you'll receive an electronic, "Making of the Game" document, detailing design decisions as well as art development along the way.  (You can see the revisions of good guys, bad guys, mechs!)\r\nThis reward is included in all higher rewards.

LRRP - A copy of the game and entry into the Beta.  This reward is not included in tiers above it unless explicitly stated.  You just want to play this game and help shape it, and you were quick enough to do it!
SOLDIER - All previous rewards, and your name will be included in the name generator for soldiers.  Your choice of which side you want to fight on!

SERGEANT - Copy of the game, your name in credits, the name generator, and the limited edition T-shirt.  We won't be printing any of these for anyone after the Kickstarter campaign.  Physical proof that you believed in us first! (please add $10 for shipping for all international orders)

ELITE - Copy of the game, your name in credits, the limited edition T-shirt, AND your name in the name generator...\r\nBut hold on!  When your name comes up, the soldier will have stat bonuses, making you one of the more desirable soldiers.  You're elite now!

RECON - Game, credits, t-shirt, name in the generator, and be part of the Beta Testing team.  You'll be thanked separately from the other contributors, and you'll be able to test the game before it comes out and be involved in the creative process.

ARMORER - Copy of the game, your name in the credits, limited edition T-shirt, your name in the generator, Beta Test and (with our guidance/approval) name and help design a weapon!  You'll help decide the class, range, damage, and other stats (and MAN are there a lot of stats!) of a weapon that will be featured in the game!

SPECIAL FORCES - The game, your name in the credits, the limited edition T-shirt, Beta Tester status, and your likeness will be used as the basis for one of the Good Guys!  You send in the picture, and we'll have our artist use your picture as the basis for the portrait of one of our soldiers in the game!

OPERATIONS - The game, your name in the credits, limited edition T-shirt, Beta Tester status, your name in the name generator, your likeness in the game, and help design a mission that will go in the game!  You'll choose the name, help write the briefing, objective type, choose the location, types of enemies you'll go up against, and more.

CADRE - You get the game, credits, the t-shirt, Beta Tester status, but instead of getting your name in the name generator, we'll use your likeness and name as one of the characters working on base.  Each building is represented by one character, so you could be immortalized in the game as Chief Engineer, Head Mechanic, or a grumpy old Master Sergeant manning the supply desk!  We'll even work with you to try to capture your personality in the character.

GENERAL - Honestly, I can't imagine.  Take your pick of any and all of the previous rewards.  In addition, we'll stay in close contact with you, bounce ideas off you, take ideas you might suggest and give you an Assistant Designer credit when the game finally comes out.
